enhanced_by.reason: Fetching loanable assets data is necessary to ensure the loanCoin and collateralCoin are valid before borrowing.
Fetching collateral assets data is necessary to ensure the collateralCoin is valid and has sufficient collateral value.
The loanBorrowHistory method can be used to verify the successful borrowing transaction by checking the history.
The loanOngoingOrders method can be used to verify the ongoing loan order after borrowing.
